item.title: Version 1.2.19 (Build 20260114.4)
item.description:
What's New

Refactor focus change handling: remove engine reset from focus detection

Focus change detection now ONLY re-detects injection method.

Engine reset is handled ONLY by explicit user actions:

  • Mouse click
  • Arrow/Home/End/PageUp/PageDown keys
  • Tab key
  • App switch
  • Modifier key combos (Cmd/Ctrl/Alt + key, or 2+ modifiers)

This fixes issues where apps 'refine' focus after user starts typing

(e.g., VSCode: AXWindow → AXTextArea, Facebook: dropdown menus),

which previously caused the engine buffer to be cleared mid-typing.

Removed:

  • resetEngineForFocusChange()
  • isMenuOrPopupSignature()
  • Mouse click timing protection (shouldSkipResetAfterMouseClick, etc.)
  • Keystroke timing protection

Simplified modifier key handling to reset on any key combination

(Cmd/Ctrl/Alt + key, or 2+ modifiers like Ctrl+Shift).
